com.facebook.litho

Interface LithoHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLithoHandlerDynamicPriority, ExecutorLithoHandler, LithoHandler.DefaultLithoHandler, ThreadPoolDynamicPriorityLayoutHandler, ThreadPoolLayoutHandler

    public interface LithoHandler
    The Litho handler is responsible for scheduling computations on a ComponentTree. The default implementation uses a android.os.Handler with a android.os.Looper.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  LithoHandler.DefaultLithoHandler
      Default implementation of the LithoHandler which simply wraps an Handler.
